0.1.name: wordpress/db-redirect
0.1.description:
Description:
This is a simple plugIn to redirect nearly every known mobile browsers visiting your wordpress site to another alternative URL.
You can specify this URL in the admin panel of the plugIn.

Redirection depends on the HTTP_HEADER information sent by the user's device.
Detection is based on the Mobile Browser ID Strings taken from here:
http://www.zytrax.com/tech/web/mobile_ids.html

Links:
Documentation: http://www.valentinalisch.de/dev_wp/db-redirect/
Contact: http://www.valentinalisch.de/dev_wp/db-redirect/#contact

Icons in banner:
Iconset: One bit by Icojam
